string.text: Knocked Down Heroes Influences Troops
Main settings
Enable This Modification
Toggle this modification. [Default: enabled]
Show On-Screen Notifications
Toggle on-screen notifications when any hero is knocked down. [Default: enabled]
Morale penalties when heroes are knocked down
When Troop Knocks Down Unassigned Hero

The enemy's troops (all enemy's troops within 10m radius by default) suffers a morale loss when an ordinary soldier defeats an enemy hero not serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 2]
When Troop Knocks Down Formation Captain

The enemy's troops (all enemy's troops within 20m radius by default) suffers a morale loss when an ordinary soldier defeats an enemy hero serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 3]
When Troop Knocks Down General
The enemy's troops (all enemy's troops within 30m radius by default) suffers a morale loss when an ordinary soldier defeats an enemy general. Works for both sides. [Default: 4]
When Unassigned Hero Knocks Down Unassigned Hero

The enemy's troops (all enemy's troops within 15m radius by default) suffers a morale loss when an unassigned hero defeats an enemy hero not serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 6]
When Unassigned Hero Knocks Down Formation Captain

The enemy's troops (all enemy's troops within 25m radius by default) suffers a morale loss when an unassigned hero defeats an enemy hero serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 7]
When Unassigned Hero Knocks Down General
The enemy's troops (all enemy's troops within 35m radius by default) suffers a morale loss when an unassigned hero defeats an enemy general. Works for both sides. [Default: 8]
When Formation Captain Knocks Down Unassigned Hero

The enemy's troops (all enemy's troops within 20m radius by default) suffers a morale loss when a formation captain defeats an enemy hero not serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 10]
When Formation Captain Knocks Down Formation Captain
The enemy's troops (captain's formation troops) suffers a morale loss when a formation captain defeats an enemy hero serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 11]
When Formation Captain Knocks Down General
The enemy's troops (all enemy troops) suffers a morale loss when a formation captain defeats an enemy general. Works for both sides. [Default: 12]
When General Knocks Down Unassigned Hero
The enemy's troops (all enemy's troops within 25m radius by default) suffers a morale loss when a general defeats an enemy hero not serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 14]
When General Knocks Down Formation Captain
The enemy's troops (captain's formation troops) suffers a morale loss when a general defeats an enemy hero serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 15]
When General Knocks Down General
The enemy's troops (all enemy troops) suffers a morale loss when a genral defeats an enemy general. Works for both sides. [Default: 16]
Morale gains when heroes are knocked down
When Troop Knocks Down Unassigned Hero

The attacker's troops (all friendly troops within 10m radius by default) gain morale when an ordinary soldier defeats an enemy hero not serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 2]
When Troop Knocks Down Formation Captain
The attacker's troops (all friendly troops within 20m radius by default) gain morale when an ordinary soldier defeats an enemy hero serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 3]
When Troop Knocks Down General
The attacker's troops (all friendly troops within 30m radius by default) gain morale when an ordinary soldier defeats an enemy general. Works for both sides. [Default: 4]
When Unassigned Hero Knocks Down Unassigned Hero

The attacker's troops (all friendly troops within 15m radius by default) gain morale when an unassigned hero defeats an enemy hero not serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 6]
When Unassigned Hero Knocks Down Formation Captain
The attacker's troops (all friendly troops within 25m radius by default) gain morale when an unassigned hero defeats an enemy hero serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 7]
When Unassigned Hero Knocks Down General
The attacker's troops (all friendly troops within 35m radius by default) gain morale when an unassigned hero defeats an enemy general. Works for both sides. [Default: 8]
When Formation Captain Knocks Down Unassigned Hero
The attacker's troops (captain's formation troops) gain morale when a formation captain defeats an enemy hero not serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 10]
When Formation Captain Knocks Down Formation Captain
The attacker's troops (captain's formation troops) gain morale when a formation captain defeats an enemy hero serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 11]
When Formation Captain Knocks Down General
The attacker's troops (captain's formation troops) gain morale when a formation captain defeats an enemy general. Works for both sides. [Default: 12]
When General Knocks Down Unassigned Hero
The attacker's troops (all friendly troops) gain morale when a general defeats an enemy hero not serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 14]
When General Knocks Down Formation Captain
The attacker's troops (all friendly troops) gain morale when a general defeats an enemy hero serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 15]
When General Knocks Down General
The attacker's troops (all friendly troops) gain morale when a genral defeats an enemy general. Works for both sides. [Default: 16]
On-screen notifications texts
Friendly General Fallen
This text will be shown when friendly general will fall in battle.
Enemy General Fallen
This text will be shown when enemy general will fall in battle.
Friendly Infantry Captain Fallen
This text will be shown when friendly infantry captain will fall in battle.
Friendly Ranged Captain Fallen
This text will be shown when friendly ranged captain will fall in battle.
Friendly Cavalry Captain Fallen
This text will be shown when friendly cavalry captain will fall in battle.
Friendly Horse Archers Captain Fallen
This text will be shown when friendly horse archers captain will fall in battle.
Enemy Infantry Captain Fallen
This text will be shown when enemy's infantry captain will fall in battle.
Enemy Ranged Captain Fallen
This text will be shown when enemy's ranged captain will fall in battle.
Enemy Cavalry Captain Fallen
This text will be shown when enemy's cavalry captain will fall in battle.
Enemy Horse Archers Captain Fallen
This text will be shown when enemy's horse archers captain will fall in battle.
Friendly Unassigned Hero Fallen
This text will be shown when friendly unassigned hero will fall in battle.
Enemy Unassigned Hero Fallen
This text will be shown when enemy's unassigned hero will fall in battle.
Technical settings
Mod update interval in seconds
This mod updates hero and troop lists every XX seconds. It doesn’t need to be changed. [Default: 30]
Logging for debugging
Logging for debugging. [Default: disabled]
